description: Application for variation of conditions 2 and 3 (hours of operation) to extend the hours to10am to 12am of planning permission PP/2013/1453 granted on Appeal dated 10.07.2014 for 'Continued use of property as hot food / take away (Use Class A5); relocation of extract ducting and realignment of windows in the first floor flat'
decision_conditions: The proposed variation of conditions 2 and 3, by virtue of the proposed increased daily opening hours of the hot food takeaway, in close proximity to Featherstone High School would be likely result in a detrimental impact on the promotion of healthy eating amongst its students and would detrimentally impact the residential amenity of surrounding properties contrary to policy 4C of Ealing's Development Management DPD (2013) and Ealing's Protocol for Minor Material Amendments following grant of planning permission (2015).
